## Overview

Safe Browsing is a Google service that helps apps check URLs against updated lists of unsafe sites, like phishing or malware hosts. With Safe Browsing, you can:

- Warn users about risky links
- Check pages for threats by platform and type
- Block users from sharing known harmful links
